metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14228 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is an illegal address access in the function paste_tokens() in preproc.c, aka a NULL pointer dereference. It will lead to remote denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> Could reproduce by POC in git repport

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1').
